name: useIndexedDB
description: Custom hook that provides an interface to the [`IndexedDB API`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/IndexedDB_API) for client-side storage of significant amounts of structured data.

props.name: databaseName
props.description: The name of the IndexedDB database.

props.name: storeName
props.description: The name of the object store within the database.

props.name: options
props.description: Configuration options for the database connection (optional).

schema.name: onUpgradeNeeded
schema.description: A callback function executed when the database version changes or is created. Use this to create or modify object stores.
schema.type: (db: IDBDatabase, oldVersion: number, newVersion: number) => void
schema.rawType: (db: IDBDatabase, oldVersion: number, newVersion: number) => void

schema.name: version
schema.description: The version of the database. Changing this triggers an upgrade.

returns.name: clear
returns.description: Removes all items from the current object store.

returns.name: data
returns.description: The most recently accessed or modified data item.

returns.name: error
returns.description: The error message if an operation failed, or null if successful.

returns.name: getAllKeys
returns.description: Retrieves all keys currently stored in the object store.

returns.name: getItem
returns.description: Retrieves a value from the database by its key.

returns.name: loading
returns.description: Indicates if the database is initializing or an operation is in progress.

returns.name: removeItem
returns.description: Removes an item from the database by its key.

returns.name: setItem
returns.description: Stores a value in the database under the specified key.
